name: Peter
description: In the episode "JuRicksic Mort", Peter is first seen afterMichaelreports on theDinosaursarriving to Earth and mentioning how the people want to know if they come in peace. He then interrupts the report for Peter's segment, Peter's Pizza Corner, where he reviews pizza slices as Peter says that he will be reviewing a cheese slice of pizza.

name: Rick Sanchez (Evil Rick's Target Dimension)
description: Rick was a tall, lanky old man. He had long legs and arms and is very skinny. He had a dimly tanned ashy complexion and light blue hair with a bald spot on the back of his head. He had spiky hair on his head and a unibrow. His face is wrinkly as he had bags under his eyelids and a pressure fold above his unibrow that follows its position and laugh lines on both sides of his mouth. He wears a white lab coat with a light blue green shirt underneath. He also wears brown pants, a dark brown belt ...

She also says how she will never stop blaming herself if something happened to him and wants him to promise that he wont do anything bad. name: Rick Sanchez (D-99)
description: Rick D-99was a member ofSEAL Team Rickswho was sent by theCitadel of Ricksto assassinateRick Sanchez (C-137). He was clearly among the toughest and most dangerous Ricks as he was part of their elite assassination unit. His body was used by Rick C-137 in his elaborate plot to destroy theGalactic Federation. He was blown up when C-137 took control of a higher-class Rick and ordered another Rick to blow him up.

name: Buzz Advil
description: In the episode "Rattlestar Ricklactica", Buzz Advil was sent by the space snake planet as a last hope of survival as their planet was on the brink of global war because of race as they formed an advanced patchwork of industrial societies and nations. Buzz Advil later dies whenMortykills it with a hubcap after it bites the latter when arguing withRick.

name: Kristen Stewart
description: Kristen Stewart went on Leonardo DiCaprio's yacht with the Jerry Smith in her dimension, who was a famous movie star. Kristen proceeded to have sex with Jerry while on the boat, whichJerry Smithwitnessed through theInterdimensional Goggles. Their time together on the boat happened shortly before Jerry's big release party for his new movie, "Last Will and Testimeow: Weekend at Dead Cat Lady's House II", at which he later suffered a nervous breakdown.

name: Canklanker Thom
description: Canklanker Thomwas aGromflomiteveteran who served in theGalactic Federation's military duringthe revolt27glaagnarsago. He later started working at aGalactic Federation Prison, and after theGalactic Federation's fall, ingested his cyanide pill.

name: Redwood
description: InMaximum Velocitree 10, he teams up with the other Robo Trees and take down Baron Thistle’s plan again but witnessesTannenbaumaccidentally kill Baron Thistle with a gunRickandMortyspawned after changing the script with theMovie-lizer. He then sees Tannenbaum being sent to prison for manslaughter at a court house and later attacks Rick and Morty when they enter the Movie-lizer and show up at the Robo Tree Headquarters.

name: Rick Sanchez (WTM-72)
description: He is first seen protecting Shogun Morty in Japan until they are attacked by a group of Ninja Ricks that want Morty. Rick WT,-72 kills them wave after wave using his samurai blade and his technological implants. Rick then fights Ninja Rick reinforcements and continues on his journey with Shogun Morty after he defeats them all.

name: Uncle Nibbles
description: In the episode "Never Ricking Morty", Uncle Nibbles is seen reporting in theTickets Please Guy's story reporting on the "Floaty Bloody Man" as a result ofRickandMortykilling him out of the Story Train. Uncle Nibbles mentions how the world's greatest scientists are pondering it but have no answer since the last three months of his appearance at aBlips and Chitz.

name: Reverse Giraffe
description: After Rick refuses to open the blast shield doors keeping everyone inside the house, he is subdued by two other false characters and begins loudly questioning whether or not everyone else on Earth is real. Reverse Giraffe interrupts and introduces himself to everyone before accusing Rick of being a false character himself. Reverse Giraffe claimed that he went to college withHamurai, savedGhost in a Jar's life in Vietnam, and has been a shoulder forBeth Smithto cry on. His plan seems to work a...

name: Squeeb
description: After Gaia gave birth to Squeeb, he was raised throughRick SanchezandBeth Smith's sorting factory and was categorized as "unproductive", being dumped out into the mud. There, he metJerry Smith, who taught him and all the other unproductives about camping. Squeeb built a house out of wood with guttering and a door, but Jerry got angry and pulled it down, explaining that if "indoors" existed, then no one would want to go camping.

name: Churry
description: In a flashback from "Rickfending Your Mort",MortyasksRickto make a churro come to life. In a montage from the same episode, Morty and Churry are seen bonding, and after some time Morty asks Rick to turn Churry back into a churro. Rick explains that that is not possible, as Rick had to make Churry "functionally immortal" for him to be alive. To get rid of Churry, Rick and Morty planted regular churros in a desert planet, and brought Churry there in the disguise of bringing him to his family. W...

name: Mike Johnson
description: Mike Johnson is seen within a storyMortycreates in an attempt to disrupt the thematic seal of theStory Train. He appears in his house with coffee introducing himself and opening a door to greet a man who wants cookies. Mike lets the man as they see scorpions attacking the house and wanting food.Rickthen stops the story due to it not working and it being terrible.

name: Principal Vagina
description: Principal Vagina is a Caucasian old man with a buzz cut hairdo. He also has a bunch of tiny black strands of hair on his head. His scalp is very light, implying that his head hasn't always been shaved. He has a blue shirt and a darker blue tie.

description: Disheveled Rickwas an alternate version ofRick Sanchezwho has disheveled hair, a bad temper and built-in weapons. He was the first person to arrive at Rick Primes Trap and killed 3 of Rick Primes clones prior. He was most likely unaware of e fact that theDianesof other Ricks were killed and with that unaware of theOmega Device. He killedNerd RickandIndiana Jones Rickand was the final alternate Rick in the room, but he was then killed by Rick C-137 andEvil Morty.

name: Memory Parasites
description: When alien parasites arrive on a planet, they implant people's minds with false memories of invented characters being people such as friends, family members, etc. Once they have multiplied enough, they use this to take over the planet and enslave the race. They invadedEarthand confronted theSmith family.
role: Extinct on Earth, likely extant elsewhere

name: Hoovy
description: WhenMorty Smithcame to Hoovy's dimension to retrieve the aged wine, Hoovy helped him carry it and entered the Replacement dimension for a short time. However, during this brief visit, decades passed in his own world. Upon returning, Hoovy found Bova had given birth to their son,Japhethand subsequently passed away. A now adult Japheth stabbed Hoovy as revenge for abandoning them. Hoovy told his son it wasn't his fault and blamed Morty for his absence before dying from his wound. Hoovy's final ...

name: Frank
description: Frank is a tall man who has an oblong shaped head, brown hair, and wears a light blue armor suit consisting of dark blue sleeves, white gauntlets, and dark grey hands. He wears a white belt, blue and dark blue leggings, and white boots.

The two of them directly pursue the Smith family as they attempt to escape. Donna attempts to chokeSummer(her daughter Tammy's friend) but is stabbed in the eye by Beth and quickly kicked out of a back of a spaceship.

description: Cyclops Rickwas one of the alternate versions ofRick Sanchezwho appeared in the episodeClose Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind. He is a one-eyed monster version of Rick. He reappears in the episode, "The Rickshank Rickdemption."

name: Shane
description: The body of Shane's host presumably crash landed or visited theGlorzoasteroid and was attacked and controlled by a Glorzo parasite. Shane is then seen when Summer introduces him toSteveas she mentions that he will be taking over his day-to-day job and fires Steve. Shane presumably died afterRick,Mortyand Summer escaped the Glorzo asteroid and Morty's harmonica playing kills the entire Glorzo species.

name: Heistotron
description: Heistotron was designed byRick Sanchezwith the initial purpose of challengingMiles Knightly, a renowned heist artist known in the galaxy, to a "heist-off". However, the machine developed its own consciousness due to the sophisticated heist algorithm embedded in it byRick, and it started to "heist" the universe, causing chaos and mayhem. It started recruiting individuals for its crew and then erasing their memories to perform unpredictable heists.

name: Young Rick
description: WhenMortyand Fear Hole Rick arrive to theSmith Residence, a green portal appears following a pink explosion as Young Rick coversDianefrom the pink fire as they crash land on the floor. Young Rick was protecting Diane from a bomb sent byRick Primemuch like what happened to theseries' main version of Rick. Young Rick mentions how the bomb almost killed Diane and asks theSmith Familyto take care of her as he fades away and disintegrates into dust.

name: Andy
description: Andy is first seen whenRickandMortyenter the Citadel in order to fix Morty's age after the former takes an aging potion as he introduces him as the Citadel's new mascot. He then mentions how the place would not be home without Ricks "Andy" Morties. Rick and Morty then walk away from him with the latter calling him and his pun dumb.

name: Veronica Ann Bennet
description: Veronica was arrested because her bangs were not up to standard, or just because they were not cut right. She was placed in line before the Gazorpian judge in order to be handed her punishment. While standing in line in front ofRick SanchezandSummer Smith, she had a short chat with Rick on why he was on trial. Before she could say what she was there for, she was called before the judge who read up her charges. The judge sentenced her to "the silent treatment", effectively having the rest of t...

name: Alyson Hannigan
description: Alyson was assigned to defendMorty,Summer, andBruce Chutbackafter they were accused of reckless driving and manslaughter. However,Rick's shipkilled her before she arrived and reanimated her body via a control chip. Rick's car urged Morty and Summer to let Bruce take the fall for the crimes, but when they refused the car detonated the chip in Alyson's head, allowing the car to rescue them from the prison.

name: Monogatron Leader
description: The Monogatron Leader with the Monogatrons create theLovefinderrzapp to distract the people onEarthand steal their water supply due to human’s failure to master love. He is also at first shown to be a caring husband to his wife, theMonogatron Queen. Later on, the Monogatron Leader argues with his wife about their plan and his water tubes plugged into his back as they get divorced.
